import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';// useNavigateを追加
import'./styles.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CustomNavigationBar=_ref=>{let{activeButton}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();// useNavigateフックを使用
